template.name: Notification Email Template
template.jsonDefinition:
{"subject":"Incident Alert Notification - Incident Id: %Workflow.IncidentId% - ATM ID:SITE ID = %Workflow.TermId%:%Workflow.SiteId% - \t\t%Workflow.Category%.%Workflow.Sub_Category%.%Workflow.Sub_Sub_Category%","body":"The problem \\\\n%Workflow.Category%.%Workflow.Sub_Category%.%Workflow.Sub_Sub_Category% occurred on ATM ID:SITE ID = %Workflow.TermId%:%Workflow.SiteId% with Incident Id = %Workflow.IncidentId%.\\\\n
\\\\nPlease resolve the incident with in defined SLA %Workflow.TimeBefore1Escalation% Hours in order to avoid escalation.\\\\n
\\\\n

\\\\nThis is an auto-generated email. Please do not reply or write back to this Email ID. \\\\n

\\\\n\\\\n"}
